channel.title: How do i get my photoshop to work?

Any help?

item.title: How do i get my photoshop to work?
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Download Photoshop CS2, the trial from here
Once you are done downloading it, open the file with WinRAR and extract the files to your desire.
If you don’t have WinRAR, download it here

After downloading it, download this: here
then, open keygen.exe, run photoshop installer. When installing, when it asks for serial, generate from keygen.exe and paste it there.
In the middle of installing, it may ask you to activate it. The tut will be at the end.
After done installing, run it, then when it asks for the registration, cancel. Keep going until you see the activation window. Ok, now is the time.

Activation: Make sure keygen.exe is on, then on the activation screen, don’t touch anything and press activate online. Make sure you have internet. THE ACTIVATION WILL FAIL, I REPEAT, THE ACTIVATION WILL FAIL!!! THAT IS NORMAL FOR THIS TUT. Once if fails, press Phone Activation. This is where keygen.exe comes in. It will show you a serial number and an activation number. Copy the values from the activation screen into the correct spots in the keygen.exe. Then, press ‘Activate Auth Code’. Then, type that into the code value at the bottom of the activation screen. You can’t paste it there, so you have to type it there. After it’s done, cancel every other screen, restart Photoshop, and TAH-DAH! Free Photoshop. Hope this helped.

PS: I’ve done this about 20 times already, they all worked perfectly. If you can’t get it right, post your problems and I will fix them.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get my photoshop to work?
